website_summaries.verdict: An attractive lamp that is worth considering if you prefer brighter light.
pros: Rustic looks with bronze base and amber shade
cons: Shade doesn't filter out much light, which is annoying to some, beneficial to others

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s very classic lamp. I’m not sure why the negative reviews on it as it doesn’t look cheap at all. For the price, it’s a great buy. They suggest using a 13w bulb, and I used a 40w. No issues. My only complaint is that light is difused everywhere and not directed.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: OK - Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Performs it's essential function but not as attractive as the photos would have you believe. The translucent "frosted" coating on the glass shade is cheap looking - pitted and uneven. The bulb is not centered under the shade - it's on the left end which looks weird when it's lit. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: src50

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can't believe how nice this is, especially for the price. The glass and oil rubbed bronze base are both beautiful, and the base is quite heavy and solid. I'm a bit baffled by the negative reviews on this lamp, and just a tip, if you are worried about the bulb being centered, you can just put in your own smaller light bulb like I did.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous lamp! Well packaged! Great, sturdy quality! Includes the light bulb too! I accidentally broke mine by bumping the table extremely hard that it was on, knocking it over, and breaking the glass, but I love it so much, that I immediately repurchased another, without giving it a second thought bc the price for this lamp in comparison to others like it - is an absolute steal! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sole

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is perfect, very sturdy and well made. The glass shade is a lovely color and it is exactly the right size for my desk. I appreciate the fact the the shade adjusts, so I can change the light focus depending on my task. The most remarkable thing about this company was the incredible customer service. Sadly I cracked the shade, so I contacted customer service to arrange to buy a replacement. I was sad when I found they don't sell the shades separately, and shipped me an entire new lamp the same day. I would and will buy from this company again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: ORTNmom

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but junk! Don't buy! Had to peal bottom off to pull cord through which wasn't in the plastic guide so cord was scraping on sharp metal base resulting in a possible house fire had the cord been gouged. Also, do not think of setting this crap on your good wooden desk/table....it will scratch the finish on your furniture...totally raw exposed metal edges. Again, do not buy! Spend a little extra and get some quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and liked it so much, I bought another as a gift. This lamp is nice looking and a nice size for desk lighting. It is bright enough to light your papers and because of the shape of the shade, the light doesn't get in your eyes. It's sturdy and the shade is adjustable forward and back. There's a nice chain to pull to turn it on and off, which I think looks cool. Nice lamp, nice price, nice value
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship iis not precise.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the lamp, not too difficult. As another reviewer said, you really need to yank the cord through before you screw it together. What bothered me is how it was crooked standing, the arms on either side not curved equally, like the work wasn't done all too precisely. I've asked seller for a discount, as I wanted better quality for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: DjC

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I put it together easily and it is just right for my desk. This is the type of lamp that I prefer and they are now all that easy to find anymore, especially if you don't want a green shade.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a large desk, and the lighting is pretty terrible in my home office. THIS LAMP fits my space perfectly, and it's not too bright. The shade is perfect for adjusting the amount of light cast over my paperwork without hurting my eyes. I'm glad I got it even though I initially thought that perhaps it was too expensive. It's sturdy, you can't just knock it over. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: LouWheel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and attractive item. Looks nice on table. A friend wanted to know where I ordered it so she could get one too.
customer_reviews.author: Ktina

customer_reviews.title: It goes with my desk nicely. I suggest putting felt pads at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The color should be noted as oil rubbed bronze.this is a nice size lamp. It's made of metal. It's heavy and does not feel cheap. The lampshade is glass not plastic. It goes with my desk nicely. I suggest putting felt pads at the bottom so it will not scratch a desk if it's a wood surface that is easily scratched. I had to replace the light blub that came with it because it did not work. It must have broken during shipping
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Get a low watt traditional bulb (not CFL pigtail bulb) The lamp casts alot of light with the factory bulb. Otherwise the unit is nice looking and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ensoniqman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. Can't believe the quality of this lamp, it's absolutely beautiful. Also is was packaged great and arrived with no damage. Overall very happy with the lamp however one small drawback the pull chain is a little tight kind of hard to pull but works perfect. For the price we can't believe how nice this lamp is.
customer_reviews.author: A. metz

customer_reviews.title: Alera lamp
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 2 of these lamps despite the reviews. YES I did have to completley rebuild one of them. Thank gosh I am handy. They both look great now but I only am using them as decoration anf not as actual lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, huge value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Heavy, quality materials and beautiful. Common sense dictates, adhere an additional felt bottom or place on a doily if worried about scrating. Pulling the pull on off switch does not send the lamp wiggling etc. Arrived in 2 days and packed well. Super happy and satifies the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nature's Minion

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived very quickly. Very minor assembly required; took less than a minute. I bought it to replace another lamp I had that broke. It has a nice glow, and they even included an led bulb! Looks nice on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: LI Collier

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Unclear if it's the bulb that accompanied the lamp, or the lamp itself at this point, but I put it together around mid-morning, and by noon I heard a "pop" before the light went out.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice look. Top doesn't sit straight.
customer_reviews.text: The top part with the glass hood doesn't seem to sit quite level, but I guess it's ok. I think the arms are not quite bent the same way. If it starts bothering me, I might find a way to straighten it. Includes a fluorescent energy saving bulb.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Poor design engineering - Unstable, bump the desk with a chair and it's game over. Advertising pictures are heavily edited with realistic vintage brushing on edges. In reality, it's noticeably artificial. The color of the base and other associated parts are not as rich as advertised. The lightbulb socket is way off center which is conveniently hidden from advertising photos..Appears you've got a bulb burned out/missing when looking at the shade. Tacky. I've really got nothing positive for the review at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: The lampshade does not sit level...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is pretty and I will use it on my vanity because I do not have a make-up mirror with a light. But the shade has a couple of scratches and does not sit level. I am going to keep it, however, because, from a distance, you don't see that it is not level. The price was good...
customer_reviews.author: Gary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Just nope. It looked NOTHING like the picture. Colors were really different and it looked like a 2-year old had painted it with finger paints. I returned them all.
customer_reviews.author: jemimagalan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really love the lamp, so the reason I am giving this review a 3 start only is that the light bulb that came with it did not last but for 3 hot minutes and that's disappointing. I turned it on, and there was light for a brief moment, then it ceased to perform. Otherwise, the lamp itself is beautiful and sturdy. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: isa

customer_reviews.title: Did not like copper accents
customer_reviews.text: Love the heavy lamp and shade. Do not like the copper accent lines along the contours of the bronze. Would have preferred all same color bronze
customer_reviews.author: jojobeth

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this lamp again
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Stand was crooked I had to put a sham under it so it would not rock and the lamp top sat to the right.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars if it was perfectly level. The shade is slightly slanted, as if it had been damaged somehow. No amount of adjusting the components has corrected this. Very sturdy and attractive otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: whisslstop

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought the green one. This color is too bright in one spot where the bulb shines. I have to put another cover over it
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Beautiful look. Well made lamp. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Shuffield

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is OK, but the bulb was burned ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is OK, but the bulb was burned out! If they are supposed to last 7 years, they must have had it sitting on their shelf for a long time! Very disappointing to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: T. Brettschneider

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Just like pictures. Nice and heavy duty. Very classy looking and well made.
customer_reviews.author: NISSAN PHOEBE

customer_reviews.title: Very high End Quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp. The packaging was great and delivered right to my door from the Amazon Van. I highly recommend this high end affordable lamp. I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Very Satisfied Customer -#One

customer_reviews.title: Scratches all over glass
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is sturdy and works, and the overage all design is nice looking, but the glass part arrived with warped spots and scratches all over it, almost like it wasn’t new at all but had been used, returned and then sent back out to me.
customer_reviews.author: AC Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: The lamps is nice. The bulb that comes with the light is to bright for the lamp shade. I put in a different bulb and a dimmer switch on the lamp works and looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Stepheno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little desk lamp in my Interior Design business.. Stable (does not tip when chain is pulled). Well made, great price, packaged well. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. For the price I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Witt

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this bankers lamp because it's different and antique-like. It gives off a good amount of light. Goes perfectly in my office!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Had to return. What looks antiqued is actually painted on.
customer_reviews.author: Chgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, light bulb should be modified.
customer_reviews.text: Received product in scheduled time. The only thing is the light that is used, it should be designed different and be centered but other than that, it is a nice light.
customer_reviews.author: 2cats

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Easy to move around.  Fits well on small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Lamp is not very bright. Works well for valence area lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. Although inexpensive, it looks just like the lamps that cost 3 times as much. It is a perfect addition to my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Frist thing someone said "Looks old" Hust what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: sugarless49

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp. I was a little nervous based on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. I was a little nervous based on other reviews. Easily put together. The shade had a few bubble imperfections in the glass but nothing I can't live with.
customer_reviews.author: OutoftheBlue

customer_reviews.title: The glass globe that covers the light bulb provides a ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass globe that covers the light bulb provides a real bright glare. It is difficult to work at my desk because the light is at eye level when in a sitting position. I had to cover the glass with another product to be able to use the lamp at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: If there was an option for NO stars, that's the rating I'd give! The shade is crooked and there's no way to adjust it. Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the roll top desk
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Looks great on the roll top desk. Good quality. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Has a regular bulb socket.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned that being a CFL lamp that it might have a specialized socket. Turns out that it has a standard light bulb base, so I was able to use an LED bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: the lines are like orange paint stripes
customer_reviews.text: black painted metal. the lines are like orange paint stripes, the top bars are wide on the sides. the good news is it comes with a lightbulb
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: A little crooked but i straightwned it out to almost straight. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Light bulb that came with lamp was too bright. Put smaller watt bulb and turn out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Produce Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp and very sturdy. It is not cheaply made; when you pull the chain, it doesn't feel like you're going to pull the lamp over as some other lamps do.
customer_reviews.author: JD82

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Bulb keeps coming loose with chain pulls. Lamp cheaply made. Cord oddly comes out the front side, i would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Fano

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I found my lamp to be very sturdy. Nice they include the bulb. Very attractive and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Kristilyn Garza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lamp
customer_reviews.text: Gives off nice light - perfect for my desk at work
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good productg
customer_reviews.text: Really like the lamp. Looks great on my new desk.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Graham

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: wanted it for my desk ........really does look like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lahue

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice. sharp base though. put some cuts on the table. needed to put a mat under it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Soverns

customer_reviews.title: U GET WHAT U PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP. TOOK FOREVER TO UNPACK. PIECES BENT. GLASS HAD BUBBLES IN IT. DOES NOT SIT STRAIGHT ON DESK TYPICAL MASS PRODUCED CRAP FROM CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: But it's pretty enough in it's entirety to not disturb my OCD
customer_reviews.text: The part that covers the bulb is slightly crooked and it can't be fixed. But it's pretty enough in it's entirety to not disturb my OCD.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks good. My favorite accessory at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.! Feel like I went back in time. Warm and cozy lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Terry  Wanland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shade was crooked and had some defects in the glazing. Otherwise does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... the lamp at my office and it makes a great decoration when it is not in use
customer_reviews.text: I use the lamp at my office and it makes a great decoration when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mendez

customer_reviews.title: LASTS LESS THAN A MONTH
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than a month and stopped working. I wish I could get my money back. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great looking and very functional desk lamp.. love it’s style the most!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new desk and needed a new desk lamp for it!
customer_reviews.author: mamalonni

customer_reviews.title: It is stylish and matches any decor.
customer_reviews.text: Used this lamp on my desk. Very nice looking and well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but I was hoping it would give off a bit more light.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shades were slightly cracked and the lamp base was difficult to put together without damaging the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Fatime

customer_reviews.title: The first one stopped working after a few days. ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one stopped working after a few days. They sent me a new one right away! No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and the amber color and brown match my decor..very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: The color is too classic and pretty. I love
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and stable to stand The light can be pointed down so the eyes are not tired. The color is too classic and pretty.I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jaean Jung

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Better price that other website and is more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.author: Enny onoria

customer_reviews.title: Banker's Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the lamp. It was better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it for a reading lamp in my bedroom for when I read before I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Changed the light bulb to a soft white - less glare
customer_reviews.author: Joan McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is great except there was a small scratch in the base.
customer_reviews.author: Ranee Naschak

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of lamp is rough and does not have proper padding. It caused significant damage to my desk. See picture. The upper light portion of the lamp was not level once attached. The upper portion would not face the front of the lamp correctly once screwed in regardless of what position i started to screw it in. Looks great just seems to be terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Nice aesthetic design but poor manufacturing execution
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent lamp but my lamp shade came with a crack in it and has small chips around the rim of it. The light socket is much too large. Also, the assembly is quite odd as one has to pull the excess cord out of the base to screw on the top to the stand and is a bit of a struggle. I wouldn't buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. Easy to assemble. Work great. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wright

product_meta.title: Alera ALE Traditional Banker's Lamp, 16"High, Amber Shade with Antique Bronze Base
product_meta.description: Always a classic with a range of finishes and shades to fit your style. Rotating glass shades to control light focus and direction. Decorative pull chain switch. Metal construction for longevity. 13W cfl bulb is included.
feature_bullets: Always a Classic with a range of finishes and shades to fit your style.
Rotating Glass shades to Control light focus and direction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
